author: davidw
msg: docs - I don't want to maintain the same docs in two places.

author: karl
msg: Removed calls to abort_page when relatively benign conditions like no records
matching a search occur.  This allows us to emit all the code we need, like
closing the table () and emitting our page trailer, etc, instead of
having the page cut off somewhere in the middle.

author: davidw
msg: load_response that was tickled by calling it multiple times.  Thanks

author: brad
msg: Change indicators left in previous check-in after conflict merge

author: brad
msg: Changed behavior of rivet/rivet-tcl/load_response.tcl to simply
assign the results of VAR GET to the response array, overwriting
rather than appending to any existing values.
